answers.answer: hmmm, not sure...I know you heard right, but could he have meant aEndocrinologist (deals with diabetes)?

I agree, your doctor said Endocrinologist, not Gastroenterology as the latter does not deal with diabetes. Be sure to ask for an A1c test. Use Google search to understand why this test is used to verify diabetes. Good luck

question: My doctor told me that I am debetic and have high colesterol,however he did not give me any prescriptions for medications.He told me I had to go see a Gastroenterologist?Why?
title: glocc
